Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 8 Pītittika » 8.1 Paṭiccavāra » 8.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 8.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Najhānādi
Pītittika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Najhānādi
13.
668Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—  sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. (1)
669Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—  catuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. (1)
670(Namaggapaccayā nahetupaccayasadisaṃ. Moho natthi. Navippayuttapaccayā paripuṇṇaṃ, arūpapañhameva.)
<< Navipākaup8.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
